parts.value:
Help me build KidEats web app - a food delivery app for kids.
Goal: Safe, fun food ordering for kids, with parent controls and healthy eating incentives.

Features:

Kids browse food and see health info (e.g., low sugar, vegetarian).

Parents approve orders, set category/item restrictions, and weekly budgets.

Parent can set weekly goals (e.g., 2 salads = 1 fast food).

Kid-friendly.

Roles:

Kids: Browse, order (parent approval), track healthy progress.

Parents: Set restrictions, approve orders, see spending and weekly plans.
Create a vibrant KidEats application with kid-friendly menu browsing and parent controls using a bright green color scheme and playful design.

Done - KidEats application created with vibrant kid-friendly design, featuring a colorful home page, interactive kid menu with health badges and filtering, and comprehensive parent dashboard for order approval, budget management, and food restrictions.
